name: V1::MediaTypes::Filter

type.description: The type that is being used to filter. If the account_id filter is left empty, all of the accounts you have access to will be used.

value.description: The value of the type that is being used to filter.

label.description: The human-readable label for the filter. Not required when filtering resources; will be present in responses from the API.

tag_resource_type.description: The resource type that is being tagged. Only required for filters with type `instance:tag`.
